DOC.brief_summary: This study test two 18F-AV-1451 PET scan 4 week apart healthy volunteer , MCI AD subject provide result .
DOC.brief_title: A Study 18F-AV-1451 Healthy Volunteers Cognitively Impaired Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy Volunteers Male female subject ≥ 50 year age Minimental state examination ( MMSE ) ≥ 29 MCI Subjects Male female subject ≥ 50 year age MMSE ≥ 24 Have MCI consistent National Institute AgingAlzheimer 's Association ( NIAAA ) work group 's diagnostic guideline AD Have study partner report subject 's activity daily live Probable AD Subjects Male female subject ≥ 50 year age MMSE > 10 Meet clinical criterion probable AD base NIAAA work group 's diagnostic guideline AD Have study partner report subject 's activity daily live Current clinically significant psychiatric disease Evidence structural brain abnormality Evidence dementing illness AD Current clinically significant cardiovascular disease ECG abnormalities , additional risk factor Torsades de Pointes Current clinically significant infectious disease , endocrine metabolic disease , pulmonary , renal hepatic impairment , cancer History alcohol substance abuse dependence Females childbearing potential surgically sterile , refrain sexual activity use reliable method contraception Have receive participated trial investigational medication past 30 day nonstudy related radiopharmaceutical imaging treatment procedure within 7 day prior study image session .
